Subject: Re: Interrogation
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron stood up, "Okay Beastbox, that's enough. We obviously only have a
warrior he. He probably dosent know what we are even talking about. But a
warrior can be useful to us also". Beastbox kept punching his captive
though. He was like a shark who had just sensed blood. "Stand down
Beastbox" Megatron yelled, loosing most of his patience. He walked up to
Condor, and pushed Beastbox out of the way with one hand, sending Beastbox
into a wall. Beastbox started to calm down now, after that outburst of
violence.

Megatrons chest opened up, and a slithery snake like aparatus emerged. He
walked closer to Condor, and it moved towards here head, and suctioned
itself there.
